newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy offers 3-yr, 5-yr, 30-yr bonds for auction.
newsitem.headline: Italy offers 3-yr, 5-yr, 30-yr bonds for auction.

text.p: The Italian Treasury said it will issue three, five, and 30-year fixed rate bonds (BTP) at its regular mid-month auction.
The Treasury said in a statement said it would offer:
* 9th tranche 15/5/97 3-yr BTPs paying a 6.0 percent coupon.
* 11th tranche 1/11/96 30-yr BTP paying a 7.25 percent coupon.
The amount of paper offered will be announced on July 10.
Subscriptions for the three, five and 30-year BTP auctions close at 1100 GMT on July 15 -- Rome newsroom +39 6 6782501
